#showListSlider.data-intro: Selector to show specific random samples

.dataset-header.data-intro: All generated initial K initial dataset group

#grsbutton.data-intro: Click this button once you want to carry on with the generated intial dataset.

#datadriven-splash.data-intro: This is your first step. Choose a method to get data into the app.

.menu-simulationdriven.data-intro: If you dont have your own data, then choose a experiment.

.menu-datadriven.data-intro: If you want to load your data, choose one of these options.

#controller-content.data-intro: This is your remote. This is control room. Controls to generate initial samples and then random samples from it

#simulationdriven-details.data-intro: Description about the experiment loaded into the web-app.

#buttonPanel.data-intro: These are the controls for running, pausing, stopping the generation of random samples.

.inference-variable.data-intro: Variables you want to plot. Press 'Infer' or generate some more random samples before pressing.

#dotplot.data-intro: Plot of the variable you chose. Go back to the controller to choose a different one.

#sampleList.data-intro: Each entry contains a random sample group. Kth tab represents the random sample from that Kth initial sample.

#footer.data-intro: NOTE: CLICK IN THE DARKENED SPACE ONCE BEFORE YOU PROCEED
